rows.label: tlk42400013_05_msg0001
rows.name:
To interfere with the summit meeting...
Bahn is quite reckless, mo.

rows.label: tlk42400013_05_msg0002
rows.name:
He must have been desperate after
falling from his position as
Chairman of the Trade Guild, mo.

rows.label: tlk42400013_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Otherwise, he would never have
thought of attacking a heavily
guarded summit meeting, mo.

rows.label: tlk42400013_05_msg0004
rows.name:
If he hadn't been doing bad
things from the start, this
wouldn't have happened, mo.
